mapper.select: SELECT * FROM person FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person(user_id, person_name, person_phone, person_email, is_Gender, address, degree, career, created_At ) VALUES(#{userId}, #{personName}, #{personPhone}, #{personEmail}, #{isGender}, #{address}, #{degree}, #{career}, now())
mapper.update: Update person SET person_name =#{personName}, person_email = #{personEmail} , is_Gender=#{isGender}, address=#{address}, degree=#{degree}, career =#{career} WHERE person_id = #{personId}
mapper.select: SELECT person_id FROM person WHERE degree = #{degree} FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(subject_id) AS recommendCount, FIRST.* FROM recommend Right OUTER JOIN ( SELECT person.user_id, person.person_id, person.person_name, person.degree, person.career, person.address FROM person ) FIRST ON FIRST.user_id = recommend.subject_id GROUP BY (FIRST.user_id) ORDER BY COUNT( recommend.subject_id) desc

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.password, p.person_name, p.person_phone, p.is_gender, p.address, p.degree, p.career, substr(person_email,1, instr(person_email,'@')-1) AS person_email FROM users u LEFT OUTER JOIN person p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM person p INNER JOIN user u on p.user_Id = u.user_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId}
